pages.title: Apply to be added to the ‘Find a lawyer abroad’ service

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
Lawyers based outside the UK can apply online to be added to the Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office (FCDO) 'Find a lawyer abroad' service.

The 'Find a lawyer abroad' service provides lists of English-speaking lawyers in specific countries to help British nationals find the legal support that best suits their needs.

To be eligible to be added to a list you need to be qualified to practise law in that country.

You also need to be able to provide:

  • legal services and support to customers in English
  • reliable contact details, including email address
! Warning You must have access to the email address you provide. You will be sent a link that you must use to complete your application.

components.name: QLkbfP
components.content:
Feedback on this service

If you have feedback specifically about this digital service, the FCDO welcomes your views.

Email: digitalservicesfeedback@fco.gov.uk

pages.title: Check your answers
Can you provide legal services and support to customers in English?
You cannot be added to the service

components.name: WlXNxl
components.content: You can only be added to the 'Find a lawyer abroad' service if you can provide support to English-speaking British nationals.

pages.title: Your name

components.name: YBSPkn
components.content: This is how your name will appear on GOV.UK if you are added to the list.

pages.title: Company name and address

components.name: mYwfbq
components.content: This will be published on GOV.UK if you are added to the list.

pages.title: Full website address (Optional)

components.name: websiteAddress
components.title: website
components.hint:
Enter your full web address, for example:

https://www.example.com or
http://www.example.com

pages.title: Email address

components.name: CetdZQ
components.content:
This email will be used:

  • to send you a link you must use in order to submit this application
  • by the British Embassy if they need to contact you about your application

components.name: publishEmail
components.title: Can we publish this email address on GOV.UK?
components.hint: We need an email address to publish on GOV.UK so that British nationals can contact you.

pages.title: In what areas of law are you qualified to practise?
Can you provide legal aid to British nationals?
Can you offer pro bono service to British nationals?
Have you represented British nationals before?
Phone number

components.name: RpnRxn
components.content: These details will be published on GOV.UK and used by British nationals to contact you.

components.name: phoneNumber
components.title: Phone number
components.hint: Include the country code, for example +49(0)74749561660

components.name: emergencyPhoneNumber
components.title: Emergency / out of hours number
components.hint: Only provide a number here if you can guarantee it will be answered outside of normal working hours.

pages.title: Which legal regulator or local bar associations are you registered with?

components.name: regulators
components.title: Regulator(s)
components.hint: The details you give may be checked by FCDO but will not be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: Declaration

components.name: VUylUR
components.content:
By continuing you declare that you are:

  • currently qualified to practise law or meet the national criteria for providing legal services to the public, for example mandatory affiliation
  • not disbarred from practising law
  • reliable and willing to help on a regular basis
  • able to respond within a reasonable timeframe to client requests
  • willing to update or re-confirm your details on a bi-annual basis on request
  • aware that inclusion on the 'Find a Lawyer Abroad' service is not an endorsement by the FCDO and you are not affiliated to the FCDO in any way

pages.title: Which list of lawyers do you want to be added to?
Which regions do you serve?
What size is your company or firm?
Email address for GOV.UK

components.name: publicEmailAddress
components.title: Email address (Public)
components.hint: Please provide the email address your company wishes to be contacted on by British nationals.

pages.title: You cannot be added to the list at this time

components.name: zcSPPo
components.content: This is a new service and is currently only taking applications from certain countries.
